## Color {#color}

Brand and semantic colors

### Brand {#color-brand}

Primary brand palette

| Name                    | Value   | Description      | Reference             |
|-------------------------|---------|------------------|-----------------------|
| --color-brand-primary   | #FF6B35 | Main brand color |                       |
| --color-brand-secondary | #FF6B35 |                  | --color-brand-primary |

### Semantic {#color-semantic}

Semantic color tokens

| Name                       | Value   | Description                      |
|----------------------------|---------|----------------------------------|
| --color-semantic-danger    | #DC3545 | Error and danger states          |
| ~~--color-semantic-error~~ | #FF0000 | *Deprecated: Use danger instead* |

## Spacing {#spacing}

Spacing scale

| Name             | Value |
|------------------|-------|
| --spacing-large  | 16px  |
| --spacing-medium | 8px   |
| --spacing-small  | 4px   |
